body:
Even if it were exposed under go tool type (which we probably don't want) it would stop working for people using < 1.5 (go/types moved to the std repo for 1.5, not 1.6). We very much want to delete x/tools/go/types. This seems unrelated to gotype being go-gettable.

I am proposing we have x/tools/cmd/gotype and that it requires 1.5 or higher. Would that resolve the issue?

(People depending on x/tools compiling against 1.4 will need to vendor.)
